ðŸ“– Summary: Linkook is an OSINT tool designed to uncover connections between social media accounts and associated email addresses using a single username. It allows users to search across multiple platforms, retrieve interlinked information, and check for data breaches using the HudsonRock database. The tool also supports exporting data in a Neo4j-friendly format for visual analysis of the relationships.
